lemma divmod_int_code[code]: "divmod_int m n = map_prod int_of_integer int_of_integer 
  (divmod_integer (integer_of_int m) (integer_of_int n))"

lemma divmod_int_code[code]: "divmod_int m n = map_prod int_of_integer int_of_integer 
  (divmod_integer (integer_of_int m) (integer_of_int n))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. divmod_int m n =
    map_prod int_of_integer int_of_integer
     (divmod_integer (integer_of_int m) (integer_of_int n))
unfolding divmod_int_def divmod_integer_def map_prod_def split prod.simps

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. m div n = int_of_integer (integer_of_int m div integer_of_int n) \<and>
    m mod n = int_of_integer (integer_of_int m mod integer_of_int n)

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. m div n = int_of_integer (integer_of_int m div integer_of_int n)
